- implement GLXVendorPrivate
  https://github.com/litherum/chromium-mesa3d-integration/blob/9.0/src/glx/render2.c
  __GLX_BEGIN_VARIABLE_LARGE macro

GLX_EXT_texture_from_pixmap:

- X_GLXvop_ReleaseTexImageEXT 1331 - 
  https://gitorious.org/vsyrjala/xserver/commit/1137c11

<category name="GLX_EXT_texture_from_pixmap">
    <function name="BindTexImageEXT">
        <glx vendorpriv="1330"/>
    </function>

    <function name="ReleaseTexImageEXT">
        <glx vendorpriv="1331"/>
    </function>
</category>  

- add more types to TexImage2D

RenderLarge

   <request name="RenderLarge" opcode="2">
        <field type="CARD32" name="context_tag" />
        <field type="CARD16" name="request_num" />
		<field type="CARD16" name="request_total" />
		<field type="CARD32" name="data_len" />
		<list type="BYTE" name="data">
			<fieldref>data_len</fieldref>
		</list>
    </request>

http://cgit.freedesktop.org/mesa/mesa/tree/src/mapi/glapi/gen/gl_API.xml
